ygData.subject: RE: Diamond Dust.....
ygData.msgSnippet: I m pretty sure they ve down-graded Meldrath fairly recently as I ran in to him the other day and he conned blue to me at 28th.  However, he might spawn at a
ygData.messageBody:
I'm pretty sure they've down-graded Meldrath fairly recently as I ran in
to him the other day and he conned blue to me at 28th. However, he might
spawn at a variety of levels.

QdP

--- "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...> wrote:
> Always wondered. I was only a wee 20th or so at the time so never
> messed
> with him. Back to ye old drawing board then. Too bad, Meldrath might
> actually have made sense, what ever was I thinking, Verant make sense?
>
> Leagnomo
>
